org.hibernate.search.engine.integration.impl

Interface ExtendedSearchIntegrator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, SearchIntegrator
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtendedSearchIntegratorWithShareableState
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImmutableSearchFactory, MutableSearchFactory

    public interface ExtendedSearchIntegrator
extends SearchIntegrator
    Interface which gives access to runtime configuration. Intended to be used by Search components.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard, Hardy Ferentschik, Sanne Grinovero

      • getConfiguredTypesPolymorphic

        IndexedTypeSet getConfiguredTypesPolymorphic(IndexedTypeSet types)
        Given a set of target entities, return the set of configured subtypes.

        "Configured" types are types that Hibernate Search was instructed to take into consideration, i.e. types returned by SearchConfiguration.getClassMappings().

        Parameters:
        types -
        Returns:
        the set of configured subtypes

      • getIndexedTypesPolymorphic

        IndexedTypeSet getIndexedTypesPolymorphic(IndexedTypeSet types)
        Given a set of target entities, return the set of configured subtypes that are indexed.

        "Configured" types are types that Hibernate Search was instructed to take into consideration, i.e. types returned by SearchConfiguration.getClassMappings().

        "Indexed" types are configured types that happened to be annotated with @Indexed, or similarly configured through a programmatic mapping.

        Note: the fact that a given type is configured or indexed doesn't mean that its subtypes are, too. Each type must be configured explicitly.

        Parameters:
        types - the target set
        Returns:
        the set of configured subtypes that are indexed

      • isJMXEnabled

        boolean isJMXEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if JMX is enabled

      • getStatisticsImplementor

        StatisticsImplementor getStatisticsImplementor()
        Retrieve the statistics implementor instance for this factory.
        Returns:
        The statistics implementor.

      • isDirtyChecksEnabled

        boolean isDirtyChecksEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if we are allowed to inspect entity state to skip some indexing operations. Can be disabled to get pre-3.4 behavior which always rebuilds the document.

      • getIndexManagerHolder

        IndexManagerHolder getIndexManagerHolder()
        Returns:
        Returns the IndexManagerHolder which gives access to all index managers known to this factory

      • getInstanceInitializer

        InstanceInitializer getInstanceInitializer()
        Returns:
        an instance of InstanceInitializer for class/object initialization.

      • getTimingSource

        TimingSource getTimingSource()
        Returns:
        the globally configured TimingSource, which we use to implement timeouts during query execution.

      • getConfigurationProperties

        Properties getConfigurationProperties()
        Returns:
        the configuration properties for this factory

      • getDefaultDatabaseRetrievalMethod

        DatabaseRetrievalMethod getDefaultDatabaseRetrievalMethod()
        Returns the default DatabaseRetrievalMethod. This is either the system default or the default specified via the configuration property Environment.DATABASE_RETRIEVAL_METHOD.
        Returns:
        returns the default DatabaseRetrievalMethod.

      • getDefaultObjectLookupMethod

        ObjectLookupMethod getDefaultObjectLookupMethod()
        Returns the default ObjectLookupMethod. This is either the system default or the default specified via the configuration property Environment.OBJECT_LOOKUP_METHOD.
        Returns:
        returns the default OBJECT_LOOKUP_METHOD.

      • isIndexUninvertingAllowed

        boolean isIndexUninvertingAllowed()
        Returns:
        whether index uninverting should be done when running queries with sorts not covered by the configured sortable fields. If not allowed, an exception will be raised in this situation.

      • getIntegrations

        Map<IndexManagerType,SearchIntegration> getIntegrations()
        Returns a map of all known integrations keyed against the indexed manager type
        Returns:
        a map of all integrations keyed against the indexed manager type. The empty map is returned if there are no indexed types (hence no integrations).

      • getIntegration

        SearchIntegration getIntegration(IndexManagerType indexManagerType)
        Retrieve the integration information for a given index manager type.
        Parameters:
        indexManagerType - the index manager type for which to retrieve the integration
        Returns:
        The corresponding integration
        Throws:
        SearchException - if the index manager type is unknown

      • getAnalyzerReference

        ScopedAnalyzerReference getAnalyzerReference(IndexedTypeIdentifier type)
        Retrieve the scoped analyzer reference for a given indexed type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type for which to retrieve the analyzer.
        Returns:
        The scoped analyzer for the specified class.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case type == null or the specified type is not an indexed entity.
